main event: A witness observed a yellow object with a light dome or pulsating light below it in Ft. Pierce, Florida, on February 7, 1956.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 1000 ft high and about 60 ft in diameter., It had six or more red lights around its periphery., The observer claimed to have seen more than one object., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The observer suggested that the sighting could have been caused by photographic flares.
sighted object: one yellow object with a light dome
